name: mjpeg-consumer
description: a stream implementation that consumes http mjpeg streams and emits jpegs as buffers

scripts.coveralls: node_modules/.bin/jscoverage lib/mjpeg-consumer.js && USE_COVERAGE=1 node_modules/.bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov test/test.js | node_modules/.bin/coveralls

author: Mike Maelzer <mmaelzer@gmail.com>
